DESCRIPTION: Can't attack, gain #b1 [E] after playing a card. Lasts until your next turn.
Inked creatures take more damage from Attacks, equal to their Ink. Each turn, Ink is reduced by #b50%.
You can only wield one weapon at a time. If you already have one equipped, it returns to your discard pile.
Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
